category: National Pension Review Committee Operation Regulations/Article 17 (Notice of Decision, etc.)
contents: Article 17 (Notification of decision, etc.) ① When the department in charge of examination request work makes a decision in accordance with the provisions of Article 99 (1) through (3) of the Decree, it shall notify the disposition branch of the result of the review committee's decision. Revised September 16, 2022. ② If the decision requires cancellation or change of the original disposition, the branch office that has been notified of the result of the review committee's decision pursuant to the provisions of paragraph 1 shall cancel or change the original disposition without delay. must be done. Revised 2022. 9. 16.
